text: @Sheheryarbanuri @navift @ImranKhanPTI The 'you' in you're insane is figurative..didn't think I needed to spell thatout. R u tryin to convince me this virus isn't dangerous? Dear Lord..there are 1000s of deaths in way more advanced nations. Ppl w/ bad health are @ INCREASED risk. U know who has poor health? the POOR!
